price: 14. Ils me reprochent déjà un crime. Je crains donc qu’ils ne me mettent à mort. »
arabic: وَلَهُمۡ عَلَيَّ ذَنۢبٞ فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقۡتُلُونِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walahum ʿalayya dhanbun fa-akhāfu an yaqtulūni
